attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Elderly people like my husband and myself can not get out to church, but still want to worship. There has been a noticeable decline in services on TV. This is eroding our quality of life. Another disregard to our age group

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with broadcasters.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
